Mod.name: Dungeon Bullet-Hell Floor 2
Mod.author: AceMenace
Mod.description: Dodge and shoot down the Boss, if you get hit you will instantly die!

atk1.name: Primary Placeholder
atk1.description: Please choose a primary weapon below. Please do NOT choose this spell.

atk2.name: Secondary Placeholder
atk2.description: Please choose a secondary weapon below. Please do NOT choose this spell.

atk3.name: Special Placeholder
atk3.description: Please choose a special weapon below. Please do NOT choose this spell.

passive1.name: Walker
passive1.description: Move faster than everyone else for better dodging!

passiveBot.name: Passive Placeholder
passiveBot.description: Please choose a passive below. Please do NOT choose this spell.

passive2.name: Scout
passive2.description: Become smaller than everyone else making it harder for you to get hit!

blaster1.name: Auto-Blaster
blaster1.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Spam during any openings and kill the Boss!

blaster2.name: Wide-Blaster
blaster2.description: Quick cooldown and good spread. Spam during any openings and kill the Boss!

special1.name: Phase Shift
special1.description: Hold down the button to phase out for up to 1.5 seconds. While phased out, all projectiles will go through you.

special2.name: Sprint
special2.description: For 2.5 seconds, double your movement speed.

support1.description: Spawn small walls and build your own barricade! These walls will absorb one shot each.
support1.name: Barricade

support2.description: Plant a bomb where you are standing that will explode after a set amount of time, dealing high damage.
support2.name: Bomb

blaster3.name: Charge-Blaster
blaster3.description: Hold down the button to charge your blast for longer. Charge for 1 second for maximum damage.

special3.name: Blink
special3.description: Teleport a short distance to a nearby location. Teleports to your cursor.

support3.name: Thunder Clap
support3.description: A very powerful, and accurate, spell that will silence the Boss for 5 whole seconds! Note that if a spell has already been cast and is charging, Thunder Clap will NOT cancel the spell.

rush.name: Rush
rush.description: Accelerate quickly, knocking away anything in your path.

special4.name: Distortion Field
special4.description: Activate a distortion field for 1.5 seconds that will slow everything down and slightly alter the course of flying projectiles.

support4.name: Molotov Cocktail
support4.description: Throw a molotov cocktail that will explode and create a pool of fire that lasts for 2 seconds. Deals up to about 15 damage max.

passive3.name: Assault
passive3.description: Deal more damage than everyone else to finish off the Boss quickly!
